entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:55 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -41.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 10:46 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -41.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -56
Dewpoint: -45.8°C
Wind: WSW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming partly cloudy this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 33. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill minus 55 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 31 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 31 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 47 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023
